Interface System.Security."Secret Provider" Replaced by Secret Provider v2 with support for SecretValue as SecretText data type.
Page System.Apps."Extension Marketplace" This page will be obsoleted. Microsoft AppSource apps feature will replace the Extension Marketplace.
Page System.Text."Azure OpenAi Settings" Copilot capabilities settings has been moved to page 7775 "Copilot AI Capabilities"
Page System.Text."Copilot Information" Information about Copilot capabilities has been moved to page 7775 "Copilot AI Capabilities"
Page System.Text."Entity Text" Copilot pages are using the prompt dialog page, to edit entity text with a rich text editor, use a rich text control instead.
Page System.Text."Entity Text Part" This page part contains only a rich text editor, use the rich text editor control separately on your page instead.
Method SetHasAdvancedOptions Moving to Prompt Dialog page for Copilot that does not support this functionality.
Method ShowAdvancedOptions Moving to Prompt Dialog page for Copilot that does not support this functionality.
Method Update Replaced with BusinessChart Add-In
Method InitializeReport This method is deprecated. Please use EmbedReport instead.

Method ApproximateTokenCount Use the AOAI Token codeunit.
